content: Love this, and preach this same message. I sometimes refer to this as “own your work”. I would always share this with my students and tell them, “don’t just bring me a problem, bring me a solution with it”. You might not be officially responsible for a project all the way through, but you should care and act as if you are, without stepping on toes, of course. Makes all the difference in a team working environment. Thanks for posting this!
